entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
